attributes.action: Make Mps Accountable to their constituents not the Party.
attributes.additional_details:
It should only be for the Party to put up candidates for election,
But when a Mp no longer represents its constituency, then they no longer represent democracy,
If at any point a mp votes against its  constituency the it should be the public not the Party that decides to deselect them.
attributes.background:
When Mps from any party, go against their constituents,
The very constituents that voted them into power should be able to vote, to remove the Mp and create a bye-election.
If the people elected them, the people should also be able to de select them anytime the Mps goes against the constiuents.
